attributes.action: Cut fuel tax to a reasonable level FULL STOP.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the profits of oil companies being published and the British public once again having their noses rubbed in it we think its time to cut fuel tax to a reasonable level. If the oil companies are making such a huge profit just what the hell are you making out of us? We have had enough of the gross unfairness that you are dealing us on a daily basis and after all, it is the public that put you where you are, so stop crippling us and ease up.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
